data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Catamarca, Argentina to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Catamarca, Argentina
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Catamarca, Argentina to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Catamarca, Argentina to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Catamarca that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, train the church of Catamarca, Argentina to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Catamarca who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, the believers in the state of Catamarca, Argentina need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
